representation_information.name: ISO/IEC 15444-1:2004. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system -- Part 1: Core coding system [using lossless compression] (formal name); JPEG 2000 core coding, lossless compression (common name)
representation_information.description: Lossless compression encoding generally used for full color and grayscale continuous-tone pictorial images.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
